    • Constructor Detail

      • TankClient

        public TankClient(java.lang.String tankHost,
                  int tankPort)
        Constructor for the TankClient object. Upon initialization TankClient will attempt to connect to server. Upon success, it will check for ping response from server. If it's unsuccesful an error will be logged, and it will retry indefinately.

        public long getFetchRespMaxWaitMs()

        Returns:
        the maxWait to wait for (ms) (default 5s)
